item.field: Jarred Blancard, Mitchell A. Lee Yuen, Dean Choe, Richard Yee, Gabe Khouth, Nicole Parker, Kirby Morrow, Matt Hill, Jason Gray-Stanford, Michael Dobson, Lalainia Lindbjerg, Shishir Inocalla, Fiona Scott, Stephen Mendel, Larry Lam, Geoff Wong
Everyone's favorite teenage mutants are back in live action to fight crime with help from a new ninja turtle – a female named Venus De Milo.

Johnny Yong Bosch, Nakia Burrise, Blake Foster, Jason David Frank, Catherine Sutherland, Carol Hoyt, Jason Narvy, Paul Schrier, Gregg Bullock, Hilary Shepard, Tracy Lynn Cruz, Patricia Ja Lee, Roger Velasco, Selwyn Ward, Donene Kistler
The Rangers use high-tech battle cars to take on Queen Divatox and her Divazords, who mount an attack on the Rangers' beloved Angel Grove.
Lily Tomlin, Daniel DeSanto, Erica Luttrell, Maia Filar, Lisa Yamanaka, Tara Meyer, Stuart Stone, Malcolm-Jamal Warner, Danny Tamberelli
Join Ms. Frizzle as the Magic School Bus travels to outer space, under the sea, through an anthill – and even inside the human body!
Wesley Barker, Herbie Baez, Elisabeth Lund, Shannon Chandler, Billy Forester, Frank Addela, Kyle Jordan, Dave 'Foots' Footman, Derek Stephen Prince, Vivian Smallwood
When three teens free a spirit that offers to grant each a wish, they choose to become their favorite superheroes, launching a series of adventures.
